author: Cedric Canard
content:
I agree with the gist of your post and with your conclusion. And yes it is worrying, this sad state of affairs we are in.

I once read (I think this is only a theory) that the Roman Empire collapsed because of lead plumbing and lead cooking utensils. Since only the rich and influential could afford plumbing and lead pots, the people who ruled and made all the decisions slowly went mad and the Empire went into a death spiral. So perhaps, history is simply repeating itself; the rich and influential countries will slowly go crazy and bring upon themselves their own destruction. Maybe it's time to move to Costa Rica ðŸ˜‰
